com.datecs.pinpad

Class HardwareInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datecs.pinpad.HardwareInfo

  • public class HardwareInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an information about Pinpad hardware.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HardwareInfo

        public HardwareInfo(int capacity,
            boolean charging,
            boolean low,
            boolean veryLow,
            boolean external,
            int voltage)
        Constructs a new instance of this class.
        Parameters:
        capacity - the battery capacity in percents.
        charging - specify if device is charging.
        low - specify if battery is low.
        veryLow - specify if battery is very low.
        external - specify if device is attached to the external power.
        voltage - the battery voltage in 10th of Volt.
